segments.text: Oriental China Airlines . Good morning , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like the round-way ticket to Shanghai on December 10th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Lady , let me check . Do you want the morning or the afternoon flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the afternoon will be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , afternoon flight on December 10th to Shanghai . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Janice . Well , I book this ticket for Nova , the marketing manager of Pineapple Computer Company . Where can I get the flight ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You may take it up at the ticket office . That is located on International Street 150 .
segments.speaker: S1
